fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee prevent a player from visiting tonight and learn who they would have visited.
- Use 2 bees to redirect a player to another player, and that player to another player as well.
- Use 3 bees to permanently remove a random player who would visit a Stalker tonight from the game before their ability resolves, prioritising more harmful visitors.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.
